page.title: 03Static Caravans in Chapel
page.content: In Chapel St.Leonards we have people that come down and buy caravans,then they keep them on the caravan sites.Some people move their caravans onto the grass behind the Village Hall. People put their caravans behind the Village Hall during the summer because it is nearer to the beach.The holiday makers come from Nottingham,Leeds,Scotland and Sheffield.Sometimes they come at the weekend and go back home the following weekend.Some people buy their caravans in the winter and then they come down in Spring or the beginning of Summer to get the caravan ready to come to ,in the six weeks summer holiday.The caravan sites open before Easter and then they close at the beginning of October.
